publication.abstract: Â© 2015 The Author 2015. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved. Summary: Protael is a JavaScript library for creating interactive visualizations of biological sequences and various associated data. It allows users to generate high-quality vector graphics (SVG) and integrate it into web pages. Availability and implementation: Protael distribution, documentation and examples are freely available at http://protael.org; source code is hosted at https://github.com/sanshu/protaeljs.
publication.title: Protael: Protein data visualization library for the web

summary.description: Vvector graphics library for displaying various biological sequence related data on web pages.
summary.name: Protael
